metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1048 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s sound subsystem inthe way a user triggers concurrent calls of PCM hw_params. The hw_freeioctls or similar race condition happens inside ALSA PCM for other ioctls.This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate theirprivileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
